head.title: U.S. Book Is Seized By China Over Photo

hedline.hl1: U.S. Book Is Seized By China Over Photo

block.p: Chinese officials confiscated thousands of copies of a book by a former White House photographer as they were being prepared for shipment from a bindery in China, effectively blocking its release in the United States. The book was seized because a photo showed the Dalai Lama, the spiritual leader of Tibetan Buddhism, whom the Chinese government opposes.
